H0.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Chinese New Year

H1.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Easter

H2.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Diwali

H3.text: Communist forces in Vietnam began an offensive during what holiday in 1968. Tet

A4.text: The name is the truncated version of the Lunar New Year festival name in Vietnamese, Tết Nguyên Đán, a holiday period was chosen as most ARVN personnel were on leave.

A5.text: In October, the Politburo decided on the Tet holiday as the launch date and met again in December to reaffirm its decision and formalize it at the 14th Plenary session of the Party Central Committee in January 1968.
